name: Automaton Shuffle
description:
DEPLOY THE AUTOMATONS!

The city lay in ruins after years of monster attacks. we've managed to hold out in the last remaining stronghold but there is still one final monster to destroy...

- Use the remaining automatons to protect the city and defeat the monster

- Use as many different weapons as possible to ensure the most effective bots are sent into battle. The monster can defend itself from certain weapons types for a few turns once an automaton has been deployed, make sure to mix up your attacks!
